questions.question: Is it possible to have the depth of a religious life without believing in God?
For those of us who want to do good in the world, am I actually doing good?
Could you maybe talk about the difference between the Torah, the Bible and the Quran?
Why is there evil in the world if there's a God that cares for us?
Why are sex and eating and all the things that are physical surrounded with so much symbolism?
